Reactive and Interactive extensions to Java

Packages 
Package Description
hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base
This package contains base classes that help in both reactive and interactive programming.
hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.interactive
This package contains the Interactive main utility class for the interactive programming side of the library, accompanied by some helper classes.
hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive
This package contains the Reactive main utility class for the reactive programming side of the library, accompanied by some helper classes.
hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.swing
This package contains helper methods to interface the Swing's event notification mechanisms (e.g., various Listener interfaces) with the reactive programming's Observable based approach.
hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.test
This package contains simple test programs for various reactive and interactive operators.
hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util
This package contain utility classes for various Scheduler implementations and two minimalist utility classes that work with Func1 and Action1 classes.
